name: ShootPunk
description:
Steampunk is a top-down shooter bullet hell created for a project of first grade for the university Tecnocampus tutorized by Lasse Laoepfe. 

Credits:

Game design: Marc Mas

Art: Martí Parladé

Programming: Marc Mas

FX: Marcel Feliu, Marc Mas

Sound and music: Marc Mas

Level design: Marcel Feliu (world 3), Marc Mas (tutorial, world 1, world 2, world 4, survival).
